wikipedia_page.main: Neville Stamp (born 7 July 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Reading and York City, and in non-League football for Basingstoke Town.

response: Smith and York teammate Neville Stamp were assaulted by a gang in an unprovoked attack while on a night out in York in August 2001, and after suffering concussion he was admitted to York District Hospital. As part of a scheme by York for forging links with local primary schools, he was involved with Lord Deramore's Primary School.
